state.dialog: You mustn't be a hard one to remember with such a name for yourself! I say, this is not your first quest. I would share my gifts with you, but it appears you already have such strength.
There is no need for thanks, strong one.
A broad sword manifests into the emptiness before you. You grasp it proudly then store it amongst your other weapons.
That broad sword is the weapon of your character. It may aid you on your quest if you so choose.

I have summoned you here as the savior of the Below. No one short of myself has ever made it this far unto the Realm of Creation. Your conciousness even just existing here is an anomaly curious enough to dub you as strong as you claim.

I am... a creator. Yours, specifically. I have summoned you as the savior of the Below, another creation that has begun to stray from my design. Being as strong as you say, I trust you to bring peace once again.

The Below is a realm of beings, some quite like yourself. It, like all things, was created. It started as a relatively peaceful place, but after going out on a a bit of a bender and creating 'free will'... Well, things have gotten out of hand, but that's what you're here for.

Creation? How do I say... Well everything is created. By what or whom and where is up for much debate, but for certain, I created you here, In the Realm of Creation: the clay-like beginning-realm for all of my creations. You, strong one, were created to bring peace to the Below once more.
Oh just spendid! Off you go!

You pull yourself away from my voice but find there is nothing else to run towards. There is nothing but us here in the Realm of Creation. As you run further into the expansive whiteness, you find your sanity begin to slip. The endless void of white... Who am I? Who are you? Perhaps I should have summoned another... Goodbye strong one. Goodbye.

You begin the seemingly endless plummet out of the white abyss of the Realm of Creation. The white fades into a pleasant gradient of blue as you begin to see color for the first time. The greyish hues of your body change to the diverse tones of flesh. You begin to forget you're falling as you examine your newfound body. You begin to feel as though you're being submerged until suddenly...
Darkness.

You awake slowly as the sunrise pours in from beyond the mountains. You must've dozed off at your post. That's unusual... You straighten up sharply in hopes no one caught you in a moment of weekness. Someone will be here to releave you shortly.
AAaaUGH!
A frazzled woman comes barrelling down the hallway headed straight for you.
THERE IS A DRUNKARD IN THE CASTLE!
She screams at you from a far, but it might as well be directly in your ear.
DRUNKARD!
As she gets closer, you recognise her as one of the ladies in waiting.
YOU! HOW DARE YOU LET A DRUNKARD IN THE CASTLE! I WILL BE REPORTING TO YOU THE ROYAL GUARD!! GIVE ME YOUR NAME, AND FOR THE LOVE OF ALL THINGS! GET. RID. OF. HIM.
